transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello ha ji sir.

Customer: Ha ji sir. Ji sir. Accha main ye bol raha tha ki dekho ek to by lead jo hai na missing chal rahi hai aapki. Matlab upar likha hua aa raha hai suniye upar likha hua aa raha hai marble wash basin.

Customer: Theek hai aur jahan pe buyer ne likha hai ya aapki company ka system hai ki material kya chahiye to waha pe likha hua aa raha hai ceramic.

Customer: Hmm. Ab usko agar main delete karta hu to mere pass mein marble ki ya stone ki by lead nahi aayegi. Usse purchase karta hu to aap bologe ki sir aapne ceramic ki purchase kar li isliye aapke pass mein aa rahi hai ceramic ki.

Customer: Ab batao kaise kare. Yu to aise hi chain nikalta rahega itne din ho gaye koi response hai nahi aur by lead missing chal rahi hai. Pata nahi maine kitni by lead jo hai purchase kar li hogi abhi in dino mein kuch to baat bane kuch to baat bane lekin koi baat hi nahi ban rahi hai. Ek to jo hai aap by lead jo hai purchase ki hui dalte ho.

Customer: Jo ki buyer done done kar chuka hai kahin se le chuka hai wo by lead mere pass mein jyada aa rahi hai. Marble masjid member ki ek bhi nahi hai marble wazu betak ki nahi hai marble garden gain ki nahi hai stone pedestal wash basin ki nahi hai sirf only counter top basin aa raha hai usme ceramic aa rahi hai.

Customer: Thoda dhyan do na Numan sir ye fir aise to fir aap bologe ki abhi main bolunga na to aap bologe ki abhi saal bhar tak ka hai aapka package to aise main mera jo hai samay aur paisa barbad karne ke liye thodi liya hai package. Maine kal bhi bola tha aapko ki thoda sa response dekho aur abhi aaj subah uthaya hai maine to fir bhi wahi baat hai. Agar check nahi karte hain to aap bolte ho ki sir aapne to account open hi nahi kiya. Ab open karenge to aisi by lead rahegi to usme purchase kaise karenge hum.

Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aur purchase kar lete to dikkat hai nahi karenge to dikkat hai.

Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Dekho aap jo main humne product diye uske according chalne do aap.
Executive: Theek hai sir.

Executive: Theek hai. Kitni der mein aayega response?
Executive: Main ek bar check karke aapko batata hu. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are missing and irrelevant. 

- Getting buyleads of purchased products.

- No response to the issues.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and inform the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, missing, purchase, irrelevant
